name: Advert updated
text_message: Your advert {advert_title} has been updated.

name: Advert refreshed
text_message: Your advert {advert_title} has been refreshed.

name: Advert live
text_message: Your advert {advert_title} is live.

name: Share on facebook / twitter
text_message: Increase your chances! Share your advert {advert_title} on Facebook or Twitter and let your friends know what you are selling!

name: Advert rejected
text_message: Your advert {advert_title} was rejected. Read our FAQ

name: Advert live for 7 days
text_message:
It's been a week since you posted your ad {advert_title}.
I've sold it. or Get it noticed and refresh your ad

name: Advert live for 14 days
text_message:
It's been a week since you posted your ad {advert_title}.
I've sold it. or Get it noticed and refresh your ad

name: Advert live for 21 days
text_message:
It's been a week since you posted your ad {advert_title}.
I've sold it. or Get it noticed and refresh your ad

name: Advert live for 24 days
text_message: Your advert {advert_title} expires in 4 days. I've sold it.. Read our guides for helpful tips about selling quicker!

name: Advert expired
text_message: Your ad {advert_title} has expired. I've sold it. or repost your advert.

name: 4 days to print date
text_message: You have 1 day to edit your ad {advert_title} before it's in print.

name: Renew print
text_message: Your print booking for {advert_title} expired. Upgrade your advert to print.

name: No photos
text_message: Ads with photos get more viewings, upload photos to your advert {advert_title}.

name: Advert upgraded
text_message: You have upgraded your ad {advert_title}!

name: Advert upgraded print
text_message: You have upgraded your ad {advert_title}! Your advert will go into print on {next_print_date}.

name: Advert incomplete
text_message: You have incomplete advert {advert_title}. Click here to finish it.

name: Message from buyer/seller
text_message: You have a message from buyer about {advert_title}. Read the message

name: Message from seller
text_message: You have a message from seller about {advert_title}. Read the message

name: No profile photo
text_message: Buyers trust seller with photos. Update your profile.

name: No facebook signup
text_message: Verify yourself with Facebook and get this badge on your profile.

name: If profile incomplete
text_message: Tell buyers a bit more about you. Buyers trust sellers they feel they know.

name: You have new review
text_message: You have been reviewed by {name}. Read the review'

name: You submitted review
text_message: Thank you, your review for {name} has been posted.

name: Free trial ends in 5 days
text_message: Your free trial ends in 5 days.

name: You have a new order
text_message: You have a new order.

name: Leave review for buyer after buy now
text_message: Please leave a review for buyer.

name: Leave review for seller after buy now
text_message: Please leave a review for seller.

name: Leave review for buyer after contact

name: Leave review for seller after contact
